headline.main: The Military Scene in North Africa; Pictures of the Present Positions of Opposing Armies In the Regions of Tunis and El Agheila Are Sketched

lead_paragraph: The battle for Tunis was approaching a climax yesterday, as Allied forces pressed in against the narrowing defensive arc the Nazis hold around the naval base of Bizerte and the city of Tunis.
abstract: H W Baldwin comment on imminent Tunis and El Agheila battles

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
